about.title: About
about.content: I moved to Kyiv from the Donetsk region to study. I started getting interested in programming since 8th grade. I studied it more actively in 11th grade and in my first year of university. I was most interested in the MERN stack: Mongo, Express, React, Node.js. Therefore, in the future, I would like to work with these technologies, but I would also like to try something new and complement my hard skills. And while working in a team, I would like to improve my soft skills as well.

note.title: Note
note.content: I'm currently studying in a blended format (one day per week on campus), so I would like to try combining an internship/job with my studies.

education.title: Освіта
education.content:
2nd course. National Technical University of Ukraine 'Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institut'.
Faculty of Applied Mathematics. Department of Computer Systems Software.
121 Software engineering.
English level - B1 Intermediate.
